action_items.task: Set up session with physical product team for HelloFresh Canada to align on Q1 target date for influencer marketplace
Review answers from Viola regarding DACH juices support and create requirements document with Q1 estimate
Set up session with Nikita Gorshkov and Shay to review customer journey and low-fidelity designs for influencer marketplace
Connect with Jama on Monday to discuss roadmap review meeting invitees and process
Coordinate with Jama regarding roadmap review meeting
Create strategy document for Good Chop Shopify project
Create customer journey for Good Chop project and address edge cases

decisions.what: Focus on simple one-time purchase customer journey for influencer marketplace MVP
decisions.context: Due to variety of stakeholder views and need for quick validation; will start with three occasion boxes sold through influencers' channels
Initiative dates to Q3 and lacks clear problem statement; can be pushed back
One visual view for presentations (Sameer's preference) and one with swim lanes showing work streams (Nikita's preference for visibility)

decisions.what: Implement intake process with Ian as tactical point of contact
decisions.context: To minimize interactions with senior leaders like Ed; monthly roadmap reviews for visibility

decisions.what: Program revivals unlikely without full funding
decisions.context: Lack of available resources; decision would need to come from Dominic

decisions.what: Active customers can buy small kits (like dinner for two) as one-time purchase
decisions.context: Simplifies front-end by avoiding need to enforce minimum rules

blockers.issue: Inability to apply vouchers for one-time purchases may not be solved in time for influencer marketplace
Current inability to sell add-ons on one-time purchase flow
Lack of frontend development resources for multiple projects (influencer marketplace, Benelix experiment, DACH juices support)
Potential misalignment with HelloFresh Canada physical product team on Q2 launch timeline
Marina introducing unfunded work taking up design capacity

key_topics: Shopify initiatives (Factor Form and Good Chop)
DACH Juices support project for Nordic markets
Influencer marketplace MVP strategy and customer journey

decisions.what: OTP Launch scheduled for W02 with feature flag turn on, but everything ready by EOY
decisions.context: Evaluated multiple launch options (W50, W51 at 90%, W51 at 10%, W02). Chose W02 to 90% of users as less risky with devs available for support, still before peak, won't break Factor/FF. Rejected earlier dates due to dev availability during holidays and risk factors.

decisions.what: Go with separate OTP/SNS checkout flows
decisions.context: Decision made for OTP project based on analysis

feedback: Discussion about how Shopify experiment will evolve the VMS dev team
Question about life with a newborn
